short_summary: Provide exhibit warehousing and handling services.
full_summary:
# Exhibit Warehousing and Exhibitions Services
## Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: CB5631-50694244
* **Public Notice Date**: 2023-05-17
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-26T14:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Expired

##### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Service
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Description of the Requirement

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites Bidders to provide exhibit warehousing, handling, installation and dismantling, maintenance and related services in support of its exhibit programs.

The Standing Offer Holder’s warehousing facility should preferably be located within 25 km of NRCan’s offices at 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario. The Standing Offer Holder is responsible for transferring government-owned equipment located in Gatineau, Quebec to its storage at its expense.

##### Period of the Standing Offer

The period of the Standing Offer will be from the date of Standing Offer issuance to December 31, 2023 with four additional one-year periods.

#### Conditions of Participation

* **Security Requirements**: No security requirements
* **Debriefings**: Offerors may request a debriefing within 15 working days of receipt of the results of the request for standing offers process

#### Online Offer Submissions

The Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) allows offerors to use the CPC Connect service, provided by Canada Post Corporation, to transmit their offers electronically. Offerors must refer to Part 2 of the RFSO entitled Offeror Instructions and Part 3 of the RFSO entitled Offer Preparation Instructions for further information.

#### Contact Information

* ***Name***: Kimberly Roy
* ***Email***: [kimberly.roy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:kimberly.roy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
* ***Phone***: (902) 237-6548

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be downloaded from the following link:

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5631/rfso-nrcan-5000072206a-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5631/rfso-nrcan-5000072206a
